metadata.name: Krystexxa 8 mg ml Injection solution concentrate

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for use in the management of chronic arthritic conditions and certain soft tissue disorders associated with pain and inflammation

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Clonixin is a non steroidal anti inflammatory drug NSAID similar in structure to DB00586 It produces vasodilation and analgesia
